tournament.name: Watermelon Cup Win a SPM box!

decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with two partner commanders in WUR colors, Kraum and Yoshimaru. The deck includes a variety of powerful creatures, spells, and equipment to quickly put pressure on the opponent and control the battlefield. With strong removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Lightning Bolt, versatile creatures like Kari Zev and Skyclave Apparition, and powerful equipment like Embercleave and Skullclamp, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with consistent threats and efficient removal. The mana base is optimized for quick and consistent access to all three colors, enabling the deck to deploy its threats and answers efficiently throughout the game.

The main concept of this Aggro deck featuring Zurgo Bellstriker is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The deck includes a wide range of low-cost creatures with haste, as well as a variety of direct damage spells to clear the way or finish off opponents. The strategy revolves around playing aggressively from the start, constantly applying pressure with fast creatures and burn spells to keep the opponent on the back foot. The deck aims to end the game as quickly as possible, utilizing Zurgo Bellstriker's abilities to maximize damage output and secure a victory before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck revolves around utilizing aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly control the board and overwhelm opponents. It combines high-value creatures like Barrowgoyf and Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury with efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Swords to Plowshares. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Mana Leak to protect its board presence and disrupt opponent's game plans. By efficiently deploying threats and answers, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game. With a mix of versatile creatures and powerful spells, the deck is designed to be proactive and disrupt opponent's strategies while presenting a strong threat on the board.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast-paced, aggressive strategy using a diverse range of powerful creatures and spells. By utilizing the abilities of the commander, Cosmic Spider-Man, alongside cards like True-Name Nemesis and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, the deck aims to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure on the opponent. With a mix of strong creatures, efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Fatal Push, and disruptive counterspells such as Force of Negation and Mana Leak, the deck is designed to control the pace of the game while continuously advancing towards victory. Additionally, the deck includes a variety of versatile lands and support cards to ensure consistency and adaptability in different matchups.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells and card advantage while also having the ability to bounce or steal opposing threats. Baral, Chief of Compliance allows for cheaper and more efficient interaction, enabling the player to disrupt their opponent's game plan while advancing their own. The deck includes various cantrips and card filtering to ensure a steady flow of answers and threats. By utilizing a mix of permission spells and disruptive creatures, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game until a win condition can be established, whether it be through stealing their creatures, overwhelming them with card advantage, or eventually resolving a powerful spell.

This control deck focuses on disrupting opponents' strategies with a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. Hidetsugu and Kairi's abilities allow for versatility in dealing with threats and generating card advantage. The deck includes a mix of cheap interaction like Counterspell and Fatal Push, as well as powerful late-game spells like Expropriate and Time Stretch. By controlling the board and out-valuing opponents with cards like Mystic Confluence and Snapcaster Mage, this deck aims to outlast opponents and win through attrition. The mana base is optimized for consistency and includes a range of utility lands to provide additional value.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a quick and aggressive strategy, utilizing the powerful combination of Ravos, Soultender and Thrasios, Triton Hero as commanders. The deck includes a diverse range of creatures and spells to support this aggressive playstyle, from mana-producing creatures like Birds of Paradise and Noble Hierarch to powerful threats like Walking Ballista and Brightglass Gearhulk. The deck also includes valuable cards for tutoring and card advantage, such as Demonic Tutor and Spellseeker. By efficiently ramping and tutoring for key pieces, this deck seeks to quickly build a strong board presence and close out the game before the opponent can effectively respond.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Partner commanders Ravos, Soultender and Thrasios, Triton Hero to create a fast and aggressive strategy in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures such as Birds of Paradise, Noble Hierarch, and Llanowar Elves, along with powerful spells like Demonic Tutor, Swords to Plowshares, and Green Sun's Zenith. The deck also features tools for card advantage and tutor effects like Spellseeker and Eladamri's Call. With a strong mana base including fetch lands and dual lands, the deck aims to quickly ramp into threats, disrupt opponents with cards like Opposition Agent and Teferi, Time Raveler, and close out games with powerful finishers like Walking Ballista and Finale of Devastation.
